Message.Msg: There really are no "sides". Just a gaggle of thieves trying to ace you and I out of what we earn. The only squabble they have is over who gets the lions share.

The lunacy is in both parties. None of them (except Ron Paul) even mention the crooked money creation and usury racket operated by the privately owned "Fed". Why? Most are on the payroll of those that profit off of this corrupt scheme. Many rumors float around that JFK was murdered because he was thinking of issuing government, interest free currency. Lincoln was probably murdered forr actuall printing 4-1/2 billion in U.S. Notes to finance the Civil War. These have all been withdrawn from circulation (contrary to law) and now sit in bank vaults as "reserves". The only loons out there are those that trust these corrupt thieves.
